channel.title: I am makin gan AutoMiner and
channel.description:
I include SRL/SRL/skill/Mining.scar, and use the FindOreColors function, and when i run it i get this error.. [code][Runtime Error] : Exception: Access violation at address 006549BC in module 'scar.exe'. Read of address 00000000 in line 99 in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\GameTab.scar[/code]
can someone tell me what is wrong, i went to GameTab.scar on line 99 and didnt see anything wrong =/ can someone help?

item.title: I am makin gan AutoMiner and
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

[quote=“roflcopterwhoosh, post:2, topic:4312”]Did you add SetupSRLMining at the start of your script?
So your script should look like:

[code]program AutoMiner;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/skill/Mining.scar}

{your procedures}

begin
SetupSRL;
SetupSRLMining;
{call to procedures}
end.[/code]

EDIT: This might be it but I tested it and I couldn’t get an error with or without the SetupSRLMining using FindOreColors.[/quote]

i’lll try that now :)[br][size=1]Posted at: June 30, 2006, 08:53:42 pm[/size][hr]It worked, Thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: I am makin gan AutoMiner and

@1337h4x wrote:

This used to happen to me.

I always think its Windows not allowing scar to do somethign…but I’m probably wrong.

item.source: I am makin gan AutoMiner and

item.title: I am makin gan AutoMiner and
item.dc:creator: @roflcopterwhoosh roflcopterwhoosh
item.description:
@roflcopterwhoosh wrote:

Did you add SetupSRLMining at the start of your script?
So your script should look like:

[code]program AutoMiner;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/skill/Mining.scar}

{your procedures}

begin
SetupSRL;
SetupSRLMining;
{call to procedures}
end.[/code]

EDIT: This might be it but I tested it and I couldn’t get an error with or without the SetupSRLMining using FindOreColors.

Read full topic
